string.value: RADIO|Not far from you is an almost defenseless village. If you attack now, the enemy will have to draw forces away from more important targets.
RADIO|Then we'll strike another place. Remember, your job is to hold for as long as possible, not burn down the village. Do it.
RADIO|Retreat. You've done your job.
BANDIT FELIX|Well-well, our paths have crossed. I told you we'd meet again. Now I'm ready for the fight, and you won't get out of here alive!
|You stand between me and my goal. I will not hesitate to destroy you.
BANDIT FELIX|You are... really stronger than me...
RADIO|You proved your loyalty to the common cause. On the corpse of one traitor we found a note saying that he was supposed to meet with CIT agents.

RADIO|You'll meet him in place of the rebel and find out all you can. Act based on the circumstances. The meeting is in the Toskana's bar. Password is "The night is long", recall: "But the dawn is near".
|I got it. Our victory is close.

The enemies are defeated! Without their leaders, they cannot stand against us! You have brought the glorious hour of victory closer and will be generously rewarded. Zion, the secret city of Axel, awaits you.
|Here it is - the moment of truth!
AXEL|Stop, don't shoot! What do you want from me? You're not even from around here.
|Do you remember, when you sent your men to raid a neighbouring region? That day you burnt down my home village and killed my father!
AXEL|Do you always believe in vain hearsay? Who sold you this rubbish?
|She, who have seen it all with her own eyes.
AXEL|You say it was a woman? Pretty girl with a fast car and dangerous connections?
|Yeah. You described her fairly accurately.
AXEL|Lisa, I now her well. She is a viper in a human form. She has already spoilt my life and that of many other people with her lies. Welcome to the club.
|Now you will tell anything to save your neck!
AXEL|She came to me and begged for protection against the enemies, or so she said. I welcomed her as a gentlemen should. But she robbed me and ran away. I trusted her! I...
|Are you saying that you're innocent?

AXEL|Believe me, I have enough troubles in my country to not entertain the idea of fighting with eastern neighbours at the same time. For months now we do not leave positions and never attacked your home.
|I can't believe I got caught in her trap! But that doesn't excuse you. You might be innocent of one crime, but you are guilty of many others.
|What will you say to the people you tortured, will you be able to return their loved ones to them? Your life will depend on your words.

AXEL|I will say that I saved my people from the famine! And that only the strong power will stop the total degradation of our world. I claimed the sins of an entire country, and I'm ready to answer for them...
AXEL|I remember them all by names. And I only regret that now it is all in vain.
AXEL|Stop, don't shoot! What do you want from me? You don't look like an ordinary CIT soldier.
|How insightful! I admit I don't care much for your local squabbles. I just want to get to Lisa!
AXEL|Ha-ha-ha! You can get in line! So she's managed to mess with you, too. What a hellcat!
|What are you talking about?

AXEL|She came to me seeking protection from her enemies, so she said. I took her into my home, and she stole from me and fled. She used my resources and my people for her own purposes. And I almost loved her...
|Goddamn it! So I came all this way for nothing?! Wait, I know for a fact that Lisa is around here somewhere! I followed her to the borders of this region.
AXEL|I also got a report that she had returned to our territory... She was last seen near the monastery. I was about to pay her a visit when you interrupted me so unceremoniously.
|Well, now the villain won't escape me! To the monastery! And let no one stand in my way!
|I will spare you. But your reign is over. Let the people decide for themselves how to live their lives.
ALICE|I give up! You won!
|Give back what you stole from me!
ALICE|You do not understand! You won’t be able to use it right...
|Don’t push your luck! I want it back now!
ALICE|You’re the boss now. Here you go... But first listen to me. I am not a villain, as everybody thinks. I just want to find Ivan Go so badly!
|My Father? What do you have to do with him?
ALICE|He is the symbol of humanity. The one who will find him or his remains will become a hero and will be able to unite the world under the banners of progress. I just have to accomplish it!
|What strange goals you have. And means too...
ALICE|Harsh times ask for harsh decisions. I spent all my life solving the puzzle of his disappearance Finally, after years of research I managed to acquire Ivan’s diary. And that’s when you appear!
|I can hardly understand you. And I won’t forgive you for the troubles that you’ve caused me. The diary belongs to me and no-one else.
ALICE|You are so close to finding him. Please, let me go with you. I want to see my quest complete!
|I am going to the oracle. Alone! Maybe we shall meet again someday and I will tell you the end of my story.
ALICE|Well, I didn't expect you to agree. Good luck.
|Wow! Curious natural phenomenon. I think scientists in Midgard would be interested in it!
|Now you're going to die!
Do you want to leave Argen for Vahat?
Do you wish to travel to another region?
Do you wish to travel to another region?
|It's a strange place. I'd better stay away from here.
